languages.text: Дурно установленный мельта-заряд взрывается кипящим облаком плазмы вместо того, чтобы прожечь толстую пласталь фокусированным лучом энергии.
A poorly placed melta charge explodes in a seething cloud of plasma instead of burning through the thick plasteel with a focused energy beam.
languages.original_text: Дурно установленный мельта-заряд взрывается кипящим облаком плазмы вместо того, чтобы прожечь толстую пласталь фокусированным лучом энергии.

traits.locale_text: A poorly placed melta charge explodes in a seething cloud of plasma instead of burning through the thick plasteel with a focused energy beam.
A poorly placed melta charge explodes in a seething cloud of plasma instead of burning through the thick plasteel with a focused energy beam.
A poorly placed melta charge explodes in a seething cloud of plasma instead of burning through the thick plasteel with a focused energy beam.

languages.text: Eine schlecht platzierte Melterladung explodiert in einer kochenden Wolke aus Plasma, anstatt sich mit einem fokussierten Energiestrahl durch das dicke Plastahl zu brennen.
languages.original_text: A poorly placed melta charge explodes in a seething cloud of plasma instead of burning through the thick plasteel with a focused energy beam.

traits.locale_text: Eine schlecht platzierte Melterladung explodiert in einer kochenden Wolke aus Plasma, anstatt sich mit einem fokussierten Energiestrahl durch das dicke Plastahl zu brennen.

languages.text: Une charge à fusion mal placée explose dans un nuage de plasma au lieu de brûler l'épais plastacier avec un rayon d'énergie focalisé.
languages.original_text: A poorly placed melta charge explodes in a seething cloud of plasma instead of burning through the thick plasteel with a focused energy beam.

traits.locale_text: Une charge à fusion mal placée explose dans un nuage de plasma au lieu de brûler l'épais plastacier avec un rayon d'énergie focalisé.

languages.text: 热熔炸弹放置不当，并没有产生足以烧穿塑钢板的聚焦能量束，而是在一片沸腾的等离子云雾中灰飞烟灭。
languages.original_text: A poorly placed melta charge explodes in a seething cloud of plasma instead of burning through the thick plasteel with a focused energy beam.

traits.locale_text: 热熔炸弹放置不当，并没有产生足以烧穿塑钢板的聚焦能量束，而是在一片沸腾的等离子云雾中灰飞烟灭。

languages.text: 乱雑に配置されたメルタチャージは、収束されたエネルギーによって分厚いプラスチールを貫通する代わりに、プラズマの雲の中で爆発した。
languages.original_text: A poorly placed melta charge explodes in a seething cloud of plasma instead of burning through the thick plasteel with a focused energy beam.

traits.locale_text: 乱雑に配置されたメルタチャージは、収束されたエネルギーによって分厚いプラスチールを貫通する代わりに、プラズマの雲の中で爆発した。

languages.text: Una carga de fusión mal aplicada explota en una nube de plasma en vez de lanzar un haz concentrado de energía y atravesar el denso plastiacero.
languages.original_text: A poorly placed melta charge explodes in a seething cloud of plasma instead of burning through the thick plasteel with a focused energy beam.

traits.locale_text: Una carga de fusión mal aplicada explota en una nube de plasma en vez de lanzar un haz concentrado de energía y atravesar el denso plastiacero.

languages.text: Kötü yerleştirilmiş melta bombası, odaklanmış bir enerji ışını ile kalın plasçeliği yakıp delmek yerine kaynayan bir plazma bulutu eşliğinde patlıyor.
languages.original_text: A poorly placed melta charge explodes in a seething cloud of plasma instead of burning through the thick plasteel with a focused energy beam.
